title: Evan Burl and the Falling, Vol. 1-2
description: My father abandoned me when I was an infant.My friends have turned against me. My uncle beats me.The most powerful people in the world want me dead.They all have one thing in common.They think I’m turning into a monster.I’m starting to worry they’re right.Librarian's Note: This is an alternate cover edition for ISBN 9780988251007.
author: Justin Blaney
